page.title: 18TERLING GHOSTS BY JONATHAN
page.content: I live at Vine Cottage, which is 635 years old and is opposite the Church. It has a lovely Crown Post in the roof and a Cellar, which was used as a dairy in my Great Grandmother's time. We have two ghosts, but they are not very old. One was my Grandad's Auntie Maud, whose body is buried under the fir tree in Terling Churchyard. She lived here and was an asthmatic and bedridden, and when she wanted anything, would bang with her stick on the floor. My Mum and Dad have often heard banging from the front bedroom, but have never seen her ghost. Our other ghost seems to like ornaments and jewellery and hides them, then puts them back, like my Mum's ring, which was missing for 3 weeks, then suddenly appeared in the middle of the front room floor. Also ornaments have disappeared from a locked room.
